page.title: 02A childs day in 1985
page.content: {Becky Simmonds.}On Monday morning my mum wakes me at about seven o'clock. When I'm ready I call for Sarah.At school the bell rings at nine o'clock time for morning assembly.After that we do some kind of writing.We go to the hall for singing,then out to play. Usually after play we do maths. {Carolyn Myers.}After maths we go into dinner.My favorite veg.is baked beans. At the dinner table I serve with Kelly.I like the children at our table they're polite.{Sarah Till.}After lunch we do activities.We have paint, chalk,felt pens and tissue paper.We normally draw what we are doing for our topic.{Philip Dickinson.}At night I have my tea and go to football.We are the Reds.We split into teams of 7 a side.I'm always on the winning team. On my way home I call on my nanans.I go home to bed.I listen to the trees.
